FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, variable 2 to 4, becoming southerly or southeasterly 3 to 5 later. In north, southerly or southeasterly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In south, slight or moderate. in north, moderate, occasionally rough in west.
Weather
In south, fog patches in southeast. In north, fair then occasional rain.
Visibility
In south, moderate or good, occasionally very poor in southeast. In north, moderate or good, occasionally poor.
